product_name: Ortovox Tour 30 + 7 ABS Avalanche Airbag Pack - Women's
long_description: With a light, low-profile airbag inflation system, the women's Ortovox Tour 30 + 7 ABS Avalanche Airbag pack serves up protection for ski enthusiasts and professionals venturing into the backcountry.
short_description: With a light, low-profile airbag inflation system, the women's Ortovox Tour 30 + 7 ABS Avalanche Airbag pack serves up protection for ski enthusiasts and professionals venturing into the backcountry.
